member.summary: Hosts tests.

member.summary: The assemblies configuration for running tests on this shell.

member.name: M:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.JetTestHost.PumpOutLeftovers
member.summary: Attempts to pump out all of the leftover deferred actions.

member.name: F:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.JetTestHost.ExceptionTrap
member.summary: Accumulates logger exceptions. Throw them out when noone is to intercept them so that they got right to NUnit (eg in test teardown).

summary.para: The host is collecting exceptions with throughout its life; at any time they could be thrown out with (normally, this should be done after every test).
Take care to let the exceptions out to the test runner (i.e. not get them caught with ).

If there're any exceptions on shutting down the Shell/Environment, they'd be normally thrown out when disposing of , but within the lifetime termination they'd be recaptured by the . To avoid losing these exceptions, they're dumped into this field. Throw them out after terminating the host lifetime.

member.name: T:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.PlatformTestEnvironmentAssembly
member.summary: Must be in the global namespace. This class creates the test environment before running tests in this assembly, and destroys it after all the tests. Plant a class in each assembly with platform tests (unless they're really unit tests), inherited from this one.

member.name: T:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.TestEnvironmentAssembly
member.summary: Must be in the global namespace. This class creates the test environment before running tests in this assembly, and destroys it after all the tests. Plant a class in each assembly with tests, inherited from the product-specific base class (which should define the app descriptor override for its product).

member.name: F:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.TestEnvironmentAssembly.PRODUCT_ENV_VAR
member.summary: Environment variable name assigned of product instalattion directory

member.name: M:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.TestEnvironmentAssembly.CreateApplicationDescriptor
member.summary: Creates the application descriptor. It defines which assemblies will provide components for the test environment. Should be oevrridden once per product. Other product assemblies' scope classes should derive from that base class.

member.name: P:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.TestEnvironmentAssembly.IsRunningTestsInInternalMode
member.summary: Override in assemblies which would like to run tests in internal mode. The default is False.

member.name: P:JetBrains.TestShell.Infra.AssemblyScope.TestEnvironmentAssembly.IsRunningTestsWithAsyncBehaviorProhibited
member.summary: Override in assemblies which would like to run tests with suppressed async calls like or . The default is False.

member.summary: Whether we've altered the value, and have to restore it on .

member.summary: Caches the overridden , if .

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.#ctor
member.summary: Enables logger's passing exceptions out of safe methods. Attaches self. Does not change the value.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.#ctor(JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables logger's passing exceptions out of safe methods. Attaches self. Optionally, lowers the value for the lifetime of the instance, so that the exceptions were collected and not thrown immediately.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Forces the finalizable objects to check whether their contract was fulfilled. Reports all of the exceptions that have occured within the listener's life. Detaches from the logger.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.RecycleLoggedExceptions
member.summary: Returns the current object, and creates a new (empty) one instead of it. Does not actually throw the exception. Thread-safe.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.ThrowLoggedExceptions
member.summary: If there are any logged exceptions, throws them out. Cleans up the exceptions store for further uses.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.Dispose
member.summary: Reports all of the exceptions that have occured within the listener's life. Detaches from the logger.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Util.Tests.TestLoggerListener.LoggedExceptions
member.summary: Exceptions logged during the session.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Tests.TestRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within a specified range.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue. If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Tests.TestRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes zero but not maxValue.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Tests.TestRandom.Next01
member.summary: Returns a random floating-point value in the [0..1) range.
